jobDescription: Our client is a leading supplier of precision fluid control products to a wide variety of industries including aerospace, formula 1 racing, oil exploration, automotive, and off-highway equipment and medical/scientific instruments. Their products are recognized worldwide for superior quality, reliability, and performance. Job Description:The company is looking for an enthusiastic, self-motivated engineer interested in a sales position within a dynamic and fast-growing engineering company. The position requires a wide range of responsibilities including: Traveling to customers in a defined sales region to discover new business opportunities, provide technical assistance, and expand and build relationshipsCollaborating with engineers on component selection, customization, and optimizationWorking with internal product managers and applications engineers from the initial opportunity through the design process and ultimately into production and implementation.Negotiating price and deliveryBenefits:Excellent benefits package including: Highly competitive salaryLarge choice of company vehiclesHealth, dental, life, short and long-term disability insurancesProfit sharingPension planPaid holidaysPaid vacationQualifications: All candidates must have a BS Degree by June 2018 in an engineering related field and be a US Citizen.
